articles.title: Greetings to Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian President
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on his birthday.
					 Kim in the message wished the president bigger success in his responsible work for the country's independent development, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would invariably develop in future, too.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of South Africa
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of South Africa
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Lindiwe Nonceba Sisulu upon her appointment as minister of International Relations and Cooperation of the Republic of South Africa.
					 The message wished Lindiwe Nonceba Sisulu big success in her efforts for the development of the external relations of the country, expressing the belief that the traditional bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would further expand and develop this year, which falls on the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the diplomatic relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kenyan FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kenyan FM
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Monica Juma upon her appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Trade of Kenya.
					 The message wished the Kenyan foreign minister success in her work for developing the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences led by Academician Valentine Sergiyenko, chief of the Branch who is vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats returned home on Friday after attending the 7th Gold Elephant Prize International Acrobatics Festival.
					 Taking part in the festival, held in Spain on Feb. 22-26, were acrobats from 18 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Brazil, China and Cuba.
					
					 The DPRK acrobats were acclaimed by members of the festival organizing committee, acrobatic experts and spectators as they displayed their unique and refined skills in the physical acrobatics such as wire-dancing.
					
					 Their physical acrobatics "Flight on Iron Bar" and "Wire-dancing" won Gold Elephant Prize and "Handstand Etude" Silver Elephant Prize.
					
					 Three pieces given by the DPRK acrobats also won Popular Prize.

articles.title: January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
articles.content:
January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The January 15th of lunar calendar is a folk holiday of Korean people which falls on March 2 this year.
					 It is one of national customs to enjoy the first full moon's day of the Lunar New Year. From long ago, Koreans have considered the first full moon of the Lunar New Year in relation to their happiness in the year.
					
					 On the day, housewives prepare various national dishes and share them with family members, relatives and neighbors to promote peace.
					
					 Typical of national dishes for the day are dish made with five grains, sweet rice dish mixed with glutinous rice, honey, sesame oil, chestnuts, dates, pine nuts, etc. and dishes cooked with nine dried herbs.
					
					 And folk games like kite-flying, tug of war and Yut and other sports activities add festive mood to the holiday.
					
					 The festivities reach their height with greeting the first full moon of the Lunar New Year through which all people wish their desires to come true.
					
					 The January 15th of the lunar calendar and custom of greeting first full moon were registered as national intangible heritages.

articles.title: Heightened Vigilance against Imperialists' Break-up Strategy Urged
articles.content:
Heightened Vigilance against Imperialists' Break-up Strategy Urged
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The imperialist reactionary forces are making desperate efforts to stop the independent forces from growing stronger and maintain domination. To this end, they are attaching big significance to the strategy of dividing countries and nations desirous of independence and estranging them from each other as well as means of military coercion.
					 An article of Rodong Sinmun says this Friday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The situation requires all the countries and nations desirous of new independent world to heighten vigilance against the moves of the imperialists and turn out in action to foil them.
					
					 The imperialists are the enemy common to the world progressives struggling for independence and peace, and they are the main target that the world progressives should struggle against by their concerted efforts irrespective of ism, religious belief, nation and race.
					
					 Countries and nations desirous of independence and justice should oppose and reject the outsiders' intervention and domination and struggle against the imperialists by pooling efforts.
					
					 No illusion should be harbored about the imperialists.
					
					 History eloquently proves that only when non-aligned and developing countries build their own strength and intensify south-south cooperation, can they defend political independence and achieve self-sustenance in economy.
					
					 The DPRK has closely cooperated with non-aligned and developing countries in the struggle for independence, peace and international justice against imperialism.
					
					 Immutable is the stand of the DPRK to foil the imperialists' aggression war moves and firmly defend the world peace and security in firm unity with the world progressive people advocating independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning out in Spring Tree-Planting Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Turning out in Spring Tree-Planting Campaign
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Friday appeals to all to turn out as one in the spring tree-planting campaign and devote sweat and enthusiasm of patriotism.
					 Planting trees and caring them are a patriotic work for the eternal future of the country, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 In recent years the army and people of the DPRK have turned out in the nature-harnessing campaign and forest restoration campaign and made big progress in forestation and protection under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 The ardent enthusiasm to leave footprints of patriotism for the prosperity of the country and happy life of the future generations has resulted in the completion of the first-phase task for the forest restoration campaign. This is praiseworthy achievement.
					
					 This is a bright fruition brought about by the patriotism and loyalty of the army and people of the DPRK to turn the country into a socialist paradise in thick verdure under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 We still have many things to do in order to turn all mountains into treasure mountains as intended by the Party.
					
					 We should actively turn out in the spring tree-planting with ardent patriotism and make fresh progress in the work for turning the whole country into thick woodland and greenery this significant year.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Marine Drill against DPRK Staged
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Marine Drill against DPRK Staged
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News, the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet military warmongers staged a military drill aimed at the north in the South Sea of Korea on Feb. 27.
					 Involved in the drill were UH-60 Black Hawks and other helicopters of the 2nd air brigade under the 2nd division of the U.S. army in south Korea and Tokdo landing ship of the south Korean puppet navy.
					
					 The drill was aimed to acquire the capability of the U.S. helicopters for landing on the above-said ship.
					
					 The warmongers declared that the recent drill was for coordinated operation between the U.S. and the puppet forces in contingency.
					
					 They conducted a similar drill targeting the major objects of the DPRK in May last year.
					
					 The recent drill is a prelude to the resumption of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises as it was staged in the period when the Winter Olympics was successfully held thanks to the DPRK's sincere efforts and the atmosphere for improved north-south relations was being created.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the Joint Action for Release of All Prisoners of Conscience and Reinstatement of Their Rights in south Korea held a press conference outside Chongwadae on Feb. 28 in demand of the release of all prisoners of conscience.
					 At the press conference the organization made public a written protest to the authorities.
					
					 The protest claimed that the "government" should no longer ignore justice and democracy but immediately release all prisoners of conscience.
					
					 At the end of the conference, the organization thrust the protest to Chongwadae.

articles.title: LKP's Act against Reunification Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
LKP's Act against Reunification Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo, members of the People's Solidarity for Sovereignty and other organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the "Liberal Korea Party" on Feb. 28 in denunciation of its reckless acts against reunification.
					 Speakers expressed the will to steadily launch a campaign against the LKP, saying that it has to be judged by the people as it opposes peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula, creates discord among south Koreans and is hell-bent on false propaganda.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "Revolutionary Comradeship Is the Basis of Single-hearted Unity and the Driving Force of Our Revolution" on Feb. 15 to mark his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The work, published on April 7, Juche 93 (2004), clarifies the essence of revolutionary comradeship and the reason why the comradeship is the basis of the single-hearted unity and the driving force of revolution, indicating the tasks to turn the whole society into the one based on the comradeship under the unfurled slogan of comradeship.

articles.title: Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's works "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" and "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" and his New Year Address were held in Benin, Nigeria, Angola and Romania between Feb. 2 and 15.
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin and other reporters and speakers praised the ideo-theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il who developed the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding ideology in the era of independence.
					
					 They said that a number of works published by Kim Jong Il serve as a valuable ideological and mental pabulum and inspiring banner for the world progressives aspiring after independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania said that only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people who are dynamically advancing along the road of socialism, rallied close around Kim Jong Un, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bangladesh, Pakistan, Myanmar, Germany and Austria between February 2 and 15 to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the meetings were personages of different circles and masses of those countries.
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C., Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party and other speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il is a prominent thinker-theoretician who developed and enriched the Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the chairman of the Lahore Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea described the birth of Kim Jong Il as a historic event that brought light of hope to the world oppressed people.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a revolutionary party with strong sense of organization and discipline and turned the DPRK into the unique politico-ideological power in the world in which the army and people are firmly united around the Party.
					
					 The chief and members of the Dresden Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany said that Kim Jong Il regarded the interests of the people as the starting point of all thinking and activities and made painstaking efforts for their realization.
					
					 The general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK stressed that Kim Jong Il is the Songun brilliant commander who smashed the moves of the U.S. and its vassal forces to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended socialist Korea with the treasured sword of Songun.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Pakistan, Germany and Austria.

articles.title: Serbian Figure Rejects False Propaganda of Western Media
articles.content:
Serbian Figure Rejects False Propaganda of Western Media
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the Serbian newspaper Politika carried a travelogue of the DPRK written by Miroslav Lazanski, a lawmaker from the Serbian Progressive Party.
					 He noted that a military parade was held in Pyongyang on Feb. 8, the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army, and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made a speech at the event.
					
					 Giving his impressions of the military parade, he wrote:
					
					 Peace on the Korean Peninsula has been blocked by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is to blame for the present crisis on the peninsula and north Korea's access to nukes is a product of the worn-out trick of the U.S. that caused a crisis and then took advantage of it.
					
					 North Korea has maintained the stand that it will never first threaten others but develop on good terms the relations with all countries friendly toward it, but it will continue to bolster up its nuclear force guaranteeing the nation's sovereignty and security unless the U.S. nuclear threat is terminated.
					
					 Meanwhile, Serbian media elaborated on the interview with Miroslav Lazanski under the titles of "Western media's assertions about north Korea are all phony" and "North Korea is entirely different from the West's propaganda".
					
					 They quoted Miroslav Lazanski as saying:
					
					 I had wrong understanding of north Korea until some days ago, being tricked by the systematic lies fed by the Western media.
					
					 I witnessed the differing reality from the outset of the recent visit and felt the impulse to lay bare the false propaganda of the West.
					
					 He also expressed his deep impressions over the great achievements the Korean people made in various fields by their own efforts despite all sorts of sanctions that the hostile forces have imposed for decades and over the DPRK's tremendous scientific and technological power and economic potentials.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, en ocasion de su cumpleanos.
					Convencido de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por el desarrollo independiente del pais.

articles.title: Funcionario de IAN desmiente el "rumor de cooperacion" Corea-Siria
articles.content:
Funcionario de IAN desmiente el "rumor de cooperacion" Corea-Siria
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida la vispera con motivo de que circula en estos dias el "rumor de cooperacion en la fabricacion de armas quimicas" entre Corea y Siria, el director de Informacion del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la siguiente respuesta:
					EE.UU. vuelve a lanzar la campana demagogica contra la RPDC con datos inventados.
					
					En estos tiempos cuando se difunde el "rumor de uso de armas quimicas" contra los civiles en la region oriental de Siria, los propagandistas venales norteamericanos insisten absurdamente en que la RPDC "ha cooperado en la fabricacion de armas quimicas de Siria", aduciendo el informe de investigacion del comite de sancion anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Tan pronto como se publicara esa noticia, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. formo la griteria al respecto diciendo que denuncia ese "suceso" que significa un insulto a la ley internacional. Este hecho hace suponer facilmente que ese pais esta detras del susodicho "rumor de cooperacion".
					
					Como todo el mundo sabe bien, EE.UU. invento a plena luz del dia los rumores falsos que sirvieron de pretexto para agredir a otros Estados soberanos.
					
					Al fabricar esta vez por conducto del comite de sancion anti-RPDC del CS de la ONU el "rumor de cooperacion" Corea-Siria, EE.UU. intenta hacer mas fuerte el clima de sancion y presion a la RPDC e implantar a toda costa el bloqueo naval total contra ella describiendola como "pais poseedor y proliferante de armas quimicas" y al mismo tiempo, justificar la intervencion militar en Siria.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado en varias ocasiones, la RPDC nunca ha desarrollado ni producido ni almacenado las armas quimicas y rechaza la existencia de las mismas.
					
					La sociedad internacional debera tener presente que EE.UU. es el pais criminal y ente canceroso para la paz mundial que ha usado por primera vez en el mundo las armas nucleares y durante la guerra coreana de la decada 1950, asesino masiva y brutalmente a los habitantes pacificos de la RPDC empleando muchas armas bioquimicas, medio de exterminio masivo, y en la actualidad, es el primer traficante de armas de nuestro planeta.

articles.title: 15 de enero del calendario lunar - fiesta folklorica de Corea
articles.content:
15 de enero del calendario lunar - fiesta folklorica de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hoy es el 15 de enero segun el calendario lunar.
					Desde la antiguedad, el pueblo coreano celebra esta fiesta folclorica creyendo que la primera luna llena del Ano Nuevo Lunar trae la felicidad durante todo el ano.
					
					Desde la manana, las amas de casa cocinan variados platos nacionales y los comparten con sus familiares, parientes y vecinos.
					
					Entre las comidas especiales de este dia figuran Ogokbap (arroz hecho con 5 cereales), Yakbap (arroz glutinoso cocido y condimentado con azucar, datil, castana, pinon y aceite de sesamo) y la ensalada de 9 vegetales comestibles secos.
					
					Mientras tanto, se entablan los juegos folcloricos y deportivos como la voladura de cometa, juego al molinete, lucha de cuerda, juego de Yut, etc.
					
					El ambiente festivo llega al climax con la contemplada de la salida de luna llena.
					
					Al mirarla, los coreanos expresan la esperanza de que se cumplan sus deseos del ano.
					
					El 15 de enero del calendario lunar y la costumbre de acogida de la luna llena fueron registrados como patrimonio intangible nacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a todo el pueblo a la plantacion de arboles en primavera
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a todo el pueblo a la plantacion de arboles en primavera
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Reforestacion, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico el editorial llamando a todo el pueblo a trabajar con patriotismo y pasion en la campana de plantacion primaveral de arboles.
					La siembra y el cuidado de arboles son la tarea patriotica para la prosperidad eterna de nuestra patria, comienza el editorial y continua:
					
					En los anos recientes, bajo la direccion del partido, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos tomaron parte en la campana de recuperacion forestal, declarada como guerra con naturaleza, y lograron gran avance en la creacion y proteccion de areas verdes.
					
					Es un exito orgulloso el cumplimiento de las tareas de primera etapa de esa campana para la prosperidad de la patria y la vida feliz de las posteridades.
					
					Ese exito es el resultado brillante del noble patriotismo y fidelidad de todos los militares y habitantes decididos a transformar la patria en un paraiso socialista bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Todavia quedan muchas tareas por cumplir para convertir todos los montes del pais en los de oro y tesoro segun el proposito del PTC.
					
					En este ano significativo, todos deben lograr nuevo avance en la repoblacion forestal de todo el pais mediante la movilizacion general en la plantacion primaveral.
